abilities.description: Luffy grabs an opponent (in this case, a giant bird's beak) and spins them around in a cyclone motion before slamming them down. This is an anime-original technique.
abilities.firstUseContext: Luffy uses this technique to bring down a giant bird that attacked the Going Merry.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Propeller Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts the Gomu Gomu no Propeller technique against a giant bird attacking the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces an anime-original technique that demonstrates Luffy's creative use of his rubber powers.
